src.main.java.com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.database
[Java] Class DatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
  android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      src.main.java.com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.database.DatabaseHelper

public class DatabaseHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper

Class for handling database interactions This class is used for managing the database. It allows for the selection, insertion and deletion of the database data.

Authors:
Aidan Wynne Fewster
Version:
1.0
Since:
1.0
